properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 4:55PM EST until February 12 at 8:42AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Barrow and Jackson
Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Middle Oconee River near Arcade.
* From this evening until Wednesday morning.
* At 4 PM Tuesday the stage was 15.3 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by tonight and
continue to rise to near 16.2 after midnight. The river will fall
below flood stage early Wednesday morning.
* At 16 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the
woodlands, fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the
gage at Georgia Highway 82. A few dirt access roads will be
flooded. A residential yard just downstream will begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
